design_philosophy.core_concept: The Digital Dukaan - Trustworthy, Accessible, Efficient
design_philosophy.vibe: Desi Trust meets Modern Efficiency. A digital bahi-khata (ledger) that feels like a superpower.
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Light Mode Primary. High contrast for outdoor visibility. Dark mode available but secondary.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Eczar' for all H1-H3. It gives a distinctive Indian heritage feel. Weight: 600 or 700.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements. Its digits are highly legible, crucial for pricing.

primary.description: Digital Saffron - Energetic, auspicious, high visibility.

secondary.description: Ledger Ink - Trustworthy, deep slate for contrast.

accent.description: Growth Green - For success states and financial positive indicators.

spacing_system.base: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. p-8, p-12, p-16.

grid_systems.marketing: The Tetris Grid: Asymmetrical bento grids. Mix col-span-2 with col-span-1. Never equal columns.
grid_systems.dashboard: High Density Bento: Tight gaps (gap-4). Use col-span-full for main charts, col-span-1 for stats.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-slate-900 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all

cards.marketing: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-8 rounded-2xl
cards.dashboard: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-none rounded-xl p-6

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to reduce 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows: shadow-sm for depth + shadow-orange-500/10 for brand glow.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 for sticky headers. Border-b border-slate-200/50.

hero_section.usage: Hero image, right side or background with overlay

testimonials.usage: Testimonial avatar or case study cover

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building ShopSwift India. Focus on simplicity and trust. Do not use complex jargon. Use the 'Eczar' font for headings to give it a unique identity.
instructions_to_main_agent.shadcn_overrides: Override default shadcn radius to 0.5rem or 0.75rem. Use the custom colors defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use framer-motion for entrance animations (staggered fade-ins). Use 'sonner' for toasts.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts) for the analytics dashboard. Keep them simple (Bar and Line charts mostly).
instructions_to_main_agent.language: Ensure the UI supports bilingual text (English/Hindi). Use a toggle in the navbar.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use 'sonner' for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
